mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO QUIZ ( QUIZ_ID, USER_ID_FK, QUIZ_RIGHT, QUIZ_QUESTION, QUIZ_DT ) VALUES ( QUIZ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_id_fk}, #{quiz_right}, #{quiz_question}, SYSDATE )
SELECT QUIZ_SEQ.CURRVAL AS QUIZ_ID FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO QUIZ_ANSWER ( ANSWER_ID, QUIZ_ID_FK, QUIZ_ANSWER, QUIZ_EXPLAIN ) VALUES ( QUIZ_ANSWER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{quiz_id_fk}, #{quiz_answer}, #{quiz_explain} )
SELECT QUIZ_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT QUIZ_ID, QUIZ_QUESTION, USER_ID_FK, QUIZ_RIGHT, QUIZ_DT FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (SELECT A.* FROM QUIZ A WHERE QUIZ_RIGHT = #{quiz_right} ORDER BY QUIZ_ID) A ) WHERE RN >= (#{page} - 1) * #{pageSize} + 1 AND RN <= #{page} * #{pageSize}
